entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
